text: All commend patience, but none can endure to suffer.
author: Thomas Fuller

text: Patience and Diligence, like faith, remove mountains.
author: William Penn

text: Patience is the art of hoping.
author: Luc de Clapiers

text: There is something good in all seeming failures. You are not to see that now. Time will reveal it. Be patient.
author: Sivananda

text: The practice of patience toward one another, the overlooking of one another's defects, and the bearing of one another's burdens is the most elementary condition of all human and social activity in the family, in the professions, and in society.
author: Lawrence G. Lovasik
